quotes.inputQuote: To make progress you mustactually get started. The step is to take step today.
The sun does shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world's joy.

Don't be so hard on yourself. Take a moment, sit back and marvel at your life: at the grief that softened you, at the heartache that wisened you, at the suffering that strengthened you, at the betrayal that woke you. Despite everything, you are still growing. you are better now than you were then. Be proud of this
Love is like drawing a picture of a person you care for most. It takes time, passion and patience. But erasing it takes seconds
Make hay while the sun shines.
A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
